content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mine at position (16.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (16.0, 0.0)
- Wooden chest at position (16.5, 1.5) to store mined coal.
*Note: The drill is currently out of fuel.*

### Copper Ore Mine at position (-52.0, 71.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-52.0, 71.0) feeding a Stone furnace at position (-51.0, 73.0)
- Burner mining drill at position (-49.0, 71.0) feeding a Stone furnace at position (-48.0, 73.0)
- Burner mining drill at position (-46.0, 71.0) feeding a Stone furnace at position (-45.0, 73.
